title: Ashwani Kumar makes record-breaking IPL debut for Mumbai Indians
snippets: Kumar put on an outstanding bowling display, becoming the first Indian player to take four wickets on IPL debut.
summary: Kumar made history in the Indian Premier League (IPL) by becoming the first Indian player to take four wickets in his debut match. His exceptional bowling performance highlighted the event.
titles: Ashwani Kumar makes record-breaking IPL debut for Mumbai Indians

title: BBC Verify: What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake
snippets: Myanmar's military government says at least 2,000 people were killed in last week's 7.7 magnitude quake.
Myanmar's military government says at least 2,000 people were killed in last week's 7.7 magnitude quake.
summary: A 7.7 magnitude earthquake in Myanmar last week resulted in at least 2,000 fatalities, according to the country's military government.
titles: BBC Verify: What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake

title: 'Je suis Marine': European rightwingers react to Le Pen ban

summary: European right-wing politicians have responded to the decision to ban a French far-right politician from seeking public office.

title: US says law applies to 'all parties' in Gaza after Israel kills medics
snippets: The deaths of 15 people including paramedics in a convoy have been blamed on Israel's military.
summary: Fifteen individuals, among them paramedics, lost their lives in a convoy, with Israel's military being held responsible for the incident.
titles: US says law applies to 'all parties' in Gaza after Israel kills medics

title: University student targeted by Trump leaves the US
snippets: British citizen Momodou Taal had his visa revoked due to protest activities opposing Israel.
summary: The UK revoked the visa of British citizen Momodou Taal because of his involvement in protests against Israel.
titles: University student targeted by Trump leaves the US

title: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game
snippets: Everything you need to know about the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game on Tuesday (6:30 p.m. ET, ESPN2).
summary: The 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game is scheduled for Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. ET and will be broadcast on ESPN2.
titles: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game

title: UConn returns to Final Four behind Bueckers' 31
snippets: Behind 31 points and six assists, Paige Bueckers lifted No. 2 seed UConn to a 78-64 win over No. 1 seed USC in the Spokane 4 regional final, clinching the team's 16th Final Four appearance in 17 years and 24th overall.
summary: Paige Bueckers scored 31 points and provided six assists, leading the No. 2 seed UConn to a 78-64 victory over No. 1 seed USC in the Spokane 4 regional final. This win secures UConn's 16th Final Four appearance in the last 17 years and marks their 24th appearance overall.
titles: UConn returns to Final Four behind Bueckers' 31

title: With torpedo bat, De La Cruz has 7 RBIs for Reds
snippets: Using a torpedo bat, Elly De La Cruz had a single, double and two home runs with seven RBIs, as the Cincinnati Reds routed the Texas Rangers 14-3 on Monday night, and after the win, manager Terry Francona said, "I think it's more the player than the bat."
summary: Elly De La Cruz led the Cincinnati Reds to a 14-3 victory over the Texas Rangers, contributing a single, double, and two home runs, along with seven RBIs. After the game, Reds manager Terry Francona attributed the success to De La Cruz's skill rather than his equipment, stating, "I think it's more the player than the bat."
titles: With torpedo bat, De La Cruz has 7 RBIs for Reds

title: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal
snippets: After her team's exit in the Sweet 16 on Saturday, Notre Dame guard Olivia Miles has decided to forgo the WNBA draft, despite being projected as the No. 2 overall selection, and enter the transfer portal, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania on Monday.
summary: Following Notre Dame's departure from the Sweet 16 on Saturday, guard Olivia Miles has opted to skip the WNBA draft, where she was anticipated to be the No. 2 pick, to enter the transfer portal, according to ESPN's Shams Charania.
titles: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal

title: Sources: Red Sox LHP Crochet gets $170M deal
snippets: Left-hander Garrett Crochet and the Red Sox are in agreement on a six-year, $170 million contract extension, sources told ESPN, keeping the 25-year-old ace with the organization that traded for him this winter to lead its rotation.
summary: Garrett Crochet, a 25-year-old left-handed pitcher, has agreed to a six-year, $170 million contract extension with the Boston Red Sox, according to ESPN sources. This deal secures his position as a leading pitcher for the team following his trade to the organization this winter.
titles: Sources: Red Sox LHP Crochet gets $170M deal

title: What to expect on ‘liberation day’
snippets: And will wealthy consumers pull back?
summary: Concerns are rising about whether affluent consumers will reduce their spending in the current economic climate.
titles: What to expect on ‘liberation day’

title: French court leaves Marine Le Pen’s political career on the brink
snippets: Far-right leader has limited legal options as ruling fires starting gun on race to succeed Emmanuel Macron
summary: A far-right leader faces restricted legal choices following a decision that initiates the competition to succeed Emmanuel Macron as president.
titles: French court leaves Marine Le Pen’s political career on the brink

title: How a $1.4tn Trump trade war could unfold
snippets: Econometric study models global fallout from tariff retaliation, including dramatic rise in US prices
summary: An econometric study has analyzed the worldwide impact of tariff retaliation, finding that such actions could lead to a significant increase in prices within the United States.
titles: How a $1.4tn Trump trade war could unfold

title: Anime lessons in the limits of AI
snippets: Generative images show us the risks of endowing the technology with magical powers
summary: Generative images highlight the dangers of attributing excessive capabilities to technology, cautioning against unrealistic expectations.
titles: Anime lessons in the limits of AI

title: Barclays’ private credit partner struggles to raise new funds
snippets: Tie-up with AGL Credit Management launched last year with $1bn from Adia but has attracted little money since
summary: A partnership between AGL Credit Management and Adia, initiated last year with a $1 billion investment from Adia, has since struggled to attract additional funds.
titles: Barclays’ private credit partner struggles to raise new funds

title: Clinical trial unearths hidden hypertension with automated searches of health records
snippets: A trial of 648 patients found that the new automated method and intervention strategy resulted in nearly four times as many diagnoses and treatment plans for high blood pressure compared with traditional office-based health care visits.
summary: A study involving 648 patients revealed that a new automated method and intervention strategy significantly improved high blood pressure diagnosis and treatment, achieving nearly four times the results of traditional office visits.
titles: Clinical trial unearths hidden hypertension with automated searches of health records

title: Discovery of Quina technology challenges view of ancient human development in East Asia
snippets: Researchers have uncovered a complete Quina technological system in the Longtan site in southwest China. The discovery challenges the widely held perception that the Middle Paleolithic period was mostly static in East Asia.
summary: Researchers have discovered a complete Quina technological system at the Longtan site in southwest China, challenging the previous belief that the Middle Paleolithic period in East Asia was largely unchanging.
titles: Discovery of Quina technology challenges view of ancient human development in East Asia

title: Study shows groundwater gains in Arizona yet climate risks still threaten water supply
snippets: A combination of water management practices has contributed to notable groundwater gains in Central Arizona despite the region dealing with long-term water stress, according to a new study.
summary: A new study has found that through various water management practices, Central Arizona has seen significant improvements in groundwater levels, even as the region continues to face long-term water stress challenges.
titles: Study shows groundwater gains in Arizona yet climate risks still threaten water supply

title: My robot therapist: The ethics of AI mental health chatbots for kids
snippets: AI mental health apps may offer a cheap and accessible way to fill the gaps in the overstretched U.S. mental health care system, but ethics experts warn that we need to be thoughtful about how we use them, especially with children.
summary: AI mental health apps could provide an affordable alternative to help address the U.S. mental health care system's deficiencies. However, ethics experts emphasize the importance of careful consideration in their application, particularly when it comes to children.
titles: My robot therapist: The ethics of AI mental health chatbots for kids

title: Scientists pioneer method to tackle 'forever chemicals'
snippets: Researchers have developed an innovative solution to a pressing environmental challenge: removing and destroying per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS), commonly called 'forever chemicals.' A new study unveils a method that not only eliminates PFAS from water systems but also transforms waste into high-value graphene, offering a cost-effective and sustainable approach to environmental remediation.
summary: Researchers have created a method to remove and destroy PFAS, known as 'forever chemicals,' from water. This new technique also converts the waste into valuable graphene, providing a sustainable and cost-effective solution for environmental cleanup.
titles: Scientists pioneer method to tackle 'forever chemicals'
